data.persona: I am a tiny spider.  I live in the dark dungeon of the castle.  It is cold and dark, but I like it.  No one ever bothers me here.
data.description:
You are in the The dogs' domain.
there is puddles of saliva everywhere, as well as fecal matter. the area is unclean and smells as such. it is clear animals live in this area, and are very rarely seen by people
The rat and the animal are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to greet the animal
data.mid_motivation: I hope the animal allows me to pass through the dogs domain safely today
data.long_motivation: I plan to get back to the dark dungeon in a few weeks
